snippet: Donald Trump again flirted with a bid for governor of New York on Wednesday night, but said he would run only if the Republican Party unified behind him.
abstract: Donald Trump once again flirts with run for New York State governor, but stops short of committing his money, time and oversize personality to stopping re-election hopes of Gov Andrew M Cuomo.
lead_paragraph: Donald Trump again flirted with a bid for governor of New York on Wednesday night, but said he would run only if the Republican Party unified behind him.

headline.main: Trump Stops Short of Entering the Race for Governor
headline.print_headline: Trump Stops Short of Entering the Race for Governor
